data.text: I managed to watch this new Bridgerton season and it was good. I still think the book was better, but the main plot themes were still present in the show and that was everything I hoped for. There's only one complain that I have and it's with Francesca's storyline +

Also it doesn’t happen much but it IS theoretically possible that Michaela could inherit the earldom. It depends on the language of when the earldom was created but if there wasn’t a single male descendant anywhere she could be made countess suo jure
